de.mrapp.android.dialog.drawable

Class AbstractTransitionDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.drawable.AbstractTransitionDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleTransitionDrawable, CrossFadeTransitionDrawable, ScaleTransitionDrawable

    public abstract class AbstractTransitionDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
    An abstract base class for all layer drawables, which allow to translate between the first and second layer in an animated manner.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractTransitionDrawable

        public AbstractTransitionDrawable(@NonNull
                                  android.graphics.drawable.Drawable[] layers)
        Creates a new layer drawable, which allows to translate between the first and second layer in an animated manner.
        Parameters:
        layers - The layers of this drawable as a Drawable array. The array may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • onStartTransition

        protected abstract void onStartTransition()
        The method, which is invoked on subclasses when the transition is about to start.

      • onDraw

        protected abstract void onDraw(float interpolatedTime,
                               @NonNull
                               android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        The method, which is invoked on subclasses in order to draw the drawable during a transition is in progress.
        Parameters:
        interpolatedTime - The interpolated time as a Float value. This is a value between 0.0 and 1.0
        canvas - The canvas, which should be used for drawing, as an instance of the class Canvas. The canvas may not be null

      • onEndTransition

        protected abstract void onEndTransition()
        The method, which is invoked on subclasses when the transition is about to end.

      • getListener

        @Nullable
public final DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener getListener()
        Returns the listener, which is notified about the transition's progress.
        Returns:
        The listener, which is notified about the transition's progress, as an instance of the type DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener or null, if no listener is notified

      • setListener

        public final void setListener(@Nullable
                              DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener listener)
        Sets the listener, which should be notified about the transition's progress.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be set, as an instance of the type DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener or null, if no listener should be notified

      • startTransition

        public final void startTransition(int duration)
        Starts the transition, which shows the second layer in front of the first layer.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the transition in milliseconds as an Integer value

      • draw

        public final void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Overrides:
        draw in class android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
